firefly.errors_submission: There was something wrong with your submission. Please check out the errors.
firefly.no_budget_pointer: Zdi se, da še nimate proračuna. Ustvarite jih nekaj na strani proračuni. Proračuni vam lahko pomagajo spremljati stroške.
firefly.no_bill_pointer: Zdi se, da še nimate računov. Ustvarite jih na strani računi. Računi vam lahko pomagajo spremljati stroške.
firefly.hidden_fields_preferences: You can enable more transaction options in your preferences.
firefly.create_another: After storing, return here to create another one.
firefly.after_update_create_another: After updating, return here to continue editing.
firefly.store_as_new: Store as a new transaction instead of updating.
firefly.split_title_help: Če ustvarite deljeno transakcijo, mora obstajati globalni opis za vse dele transakcije.
firefly.split_transaction_title_help: If you create a split transaction, there must be a global description for all splits of the transaction.
firefly.destination_account_reconciliation: Pri usklajevalni transakciji ni možno urejati ciljnega računa.
firefly.source_account_reconciliation: Pri usklajevalni transakciji ni možno urejati izvornega računa.
firefly.name: Ime
firefly.profile_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
firefly.profile_oauth_no_clients: You have not created any OAuth clients.
firefly.profile_oauth_name_help: Something your users will recognize and trust.
firefly.profile_oauth_clients_external_auth: If you're using an external authentication provider like Authelia, OAuth Clients will not work. You can use Personal Access Tokens only.
firefly.profile_personal_access_token_explanatio: Here is your new personal access token. This is the only time it will be shown so don't lose it! You may now use this token to make API requests.
firefly.profile_no_personal_access_token: You have not created any personal access tokens.
firefly.profile_oauth_client_secret_expl: Here is your new client secret. This is the only time it will be shown so don't lose it! You may now use this secret to make API requests.
firefly.profile_oauth_confidential_help: Require the client to authenticate with a secret. Confidential clients can hold credentials in a secure way without exposing them to unauthorized parties. Public applications, such as native desktop or JavaScript SPA applications, are unable to hold secrets securely.
firefly.multi_account_warning_unknown: Depending on the type of transaction you create, the source and/or destination account of subsequent splits may be overruled by whatever is defined in the first split of the transaction.
firefly.multi_account_warning_withdrawal: Keep in mind that the source account of subsequent splits will be overruled by whatever is defined in the first split of the withdrawal.
firefly.multi_account_warning_deposit: Keep in mind that the destination account of subsequent splits will be overruled by whatever is defined in the first split of the deposit.
firefly.multi_account_warning_transfer: Keep in mind that the source + destination account of subsequent splits will be overruled by whatever is defined in the first split of the transfer.
firefly.webhook_trigger_form_help: Navedite, ob katerem dogodku se bo sprožil webhook
firefly.webhook_response_form_help: Navedite, kaj mora webhook predložiti URL-ju.
firefly.webhook_delivery_form_help: V kateri obliki mora webhook dostaviti podatke.
firefly.webhook_active_form_help: Webhook mora biti aktiven, sicer ne bo poklican.
firefly.webhook_was_triggered: Webhook je bil sprožen ob navedeni transakciji. Počakajte, da se prikažejo rezultati.
firefly.message_content_help: To je vsebina sporočila, ki je bilo poslano (ali poskuseno) s tem webhookom.
firefly.attempt_content_help: To so vsi neuspešni poskusi pošiljanja tega sporočila webhook na konfigurirani URL. Čez nekaj časa bo Firefly III nehal poskušati.
firefly.no_attempts: Neuspešnih poskusov ni. To je dobra stvar!
